question.text: <math><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></mrow></msubsup></math> for reaction, <math><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>→</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> is 2.73 V. If <math><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></mrow></msubsup></math> of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> and <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> are -157 kJ <math><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math> and -237.2 kJ <math><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math> determine <math><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></mrow></msubsup></math> for <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math>

solution.text:
For given cell reaction,
ΔG o  = − nE o F
So, ΔG o  = −12 × 2.73 × 96500 J
=−3.1613 ×  10 3  kJ
Now for given reactions,
ΔG o  = 4 ×  G f o Al OH 4 − −6 ×  G f o H 2 O −4 ×  G f o OH −
(Also note that Gfo for elements is zero)
-3.1613×103=4GfoAlOH4--6×-237.2-4×-157
So, G f o Al OH 4 −  = −1303 kJ
